summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1410, for the improvement of Fremont Avenue, from Kilbourne Street to North 50th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by grading and curbing the same, and by constructing all the necessary catch basins, inlets and other appurtenances necessary to secure the proper surface drainage thereof, under Ordinance No. 15323 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
